name: Mindtrades
overview:
Mindtrades is a crackerjack resource for all your queries concerning web solutions. We offer a holistic approach for variegated fields of Internet technology. Our expertise lies in developing customized solutions for our esteemed clients. We specialize in strategic planning, web architecture or training.

Mindtrades believes in the power of strategic planning. We aver that everything can be defined, scrutinized, reduced to paramount elements, and revamped into a logical sequence, the basic necessity to achieve your goal. And when the goal is to achieve business through the use of digital technology we are on our toes.

We utilize the most leading open source management sytem, DRUPAL. Due to its numerous advantages over other platforms, it has become the leading for Mindtrades. However equal amount of assistance is available on Rails and Django and Python platforms.

Our client memorandum includes international and multinational companies comprehending multinational projects and small scale business from both private and public sectors. We being entrepreneurs as well, strive to build a business for you and develop it to the fullest.

We believe that communication is the asset for a healthy business environment hence we have a one-on-one session with our clients where in we understand your business and devise a plan after extensive research upon your area has been done. We leave no chances of guess work and hence are sure of fructification of your business.

We emphasize and put our energy into implementation through iteration to identify and execute the best possible solution serving our client’s needs.
